CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Tin
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Tin
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Tin is a soft and malleable metal, prized for its natural resistance to corrosion. Its gentle sheen and ease of alloying make it a vital component in crafting a variety of decorative and functional metal blends.
